website_summaries.verdict: If you're tired of buying disposable pads, consider this eco-friendly, reusable option.
pros: Moisture-wicking top sheet eliminates tracking and odor
Can hold more liquid than disposable economy pads
Versatile pads can be used to protect furniture and bedding, and line kennels and crates
Can also be used as post-surgery pads and to keep food bowls from skidding
cons: In some cases, the urine smell does not fully fade after washing

customer_reviews.title: Life changing. Truly. Plz don’t ever stop making these.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has Canine Cushing disease. These have been life chging for us. Disposable ones would leak, drip & when my cat trotted over them he’d leave pee paw marks on floor. Not with these. And they don’t look like diaper on my bedroom floor. They’ve held up great. I put a non slip rug pad under them. The pad never gets wet even but prevents them sliding around in hard floors and /or my dog kicking them around. I even mounted a magazine rack to store them in for easy access for me & his pet sitter. :-) Non Slip Area Rug Pad Size 2' X 4' Extra Strong Grip Thick Padding And High Quality
customer_reviews.author: Kat FL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alternative to disposable wasteful pads!
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome. Great alternative to those expensive and wasteful disposable pads - I have a senior (15 yr) old chihuahua who is having a little bit of a hard time "holding it in" if I have to leave him alone more than 2 hours to go shopping or something. I hated the thought of contributing to landfill with disposable pads, and the plastic dog potties with the fake grass tend to stink really bad after a while (in my experience), plus I didn't want something he would feel inclined to use while I'm home. These washable pads are perfect, well made, easy to fold up and hide away, and he took to it first day. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kari JoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Absorbency layer too thin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using another brand and decided to try this one. The top layer is too thin to absorb liquid quickly and the bottom layer is completely non-absorbent (at least on the ones I received), a hard plastic layer. When my small dog used it, the pee simply ran off the absorbent layer and tracked underneath the bottom. I washed the pad, thinking perhaps the top layer would become more absorbent. Nope. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Polly

customer_reviews.title: A year later and they are still working great. The only reason I gave it a four ...
customer_reviews.text: After weeks of trying to potty train my 4 year old rescue I gave in and bought two of these. A year later and they are still working great. The only reason I gave it a four and not a five is because I can't tell when the dog has used them just by looking. I have to actually smell it. I have another extra large one that is white and although I find it disgusting that I can see where the dog has peed on it, at least I know right away when to remove it. I find they clean up well and no leaking through. Definitely a great financial investment and it has saved my hard wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for long-term indoor toileting options
customer_reviews.text: These pads are a lifesaver. I have an elderly dog that needs to go to the bathroom frequently, so disposable pads are not a financially sound option with the rate she toilets. I had a set for about a year that I've just finally cycled out. I usually have 5-6 on hand at a time, change them once a day, and wash 2-3 of them together every few days with a bit of detergent & bleach, and hang them over the shower to dry. If you're looking for something that will reliably be there for a furry friend that you can't always bring out when she has to go, these are a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: INFERIOR PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Simple Solutions potty pads for several years for my mini dachshund who has used them since he was a puppy. I have been satisfied with their performance after many, many washings until last month I when bought four pads to replace some older pads. The new pads are an EXTREMELY INFERIOR product. After ONLY 4 WASHINGS, these new pads are leaking on the floor after only a small amount of urine that my small dog puts out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, little to no smell during use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our small dog who is getting older. She does not like to go outdoors anymore and soley uses the mats. I am amazed at how well these work. I wash one every other day using detergent in first cycle and vinegar in a second. No smell after washing! The urine is absorbed so quickly that I cannot see wet spots on the pads. There has been no leaks or run off. My only advice is to remember to dry on low or no heat. From experience with cloth diapers I know the seal on the bottom can wear if dried in heat. I will buy more of these and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kasondra Ham

customer_reviews.title: Terrific and last beautifully!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought several packs of these in 9/2015 and have been using them constantly. They wash beautifully and definitely absorb efficiently. With four dogs (miniature poodles) these are a godsend as my husband and I both have COPD and are on oxygen. We take them out every time they ask, but sometimes one of them just can't wait. I still have some packs that haven't been opened as they hold up so well during washing and drying. They may not work quite as well with larger dogs, but I use four at a time placed in a square so that the chances of missing are substantially reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Margy42

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's not a five star because I was hoping it would be a bit more absorbent. I guess I was imagining a cross between a paper towel and a diaper. The dog I tried it with peed on it, and though the pad didnt leak, she still was walking around on her pee. Same for poop. It has been washed several times and has held up really well. I think overall, I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: AngieT.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found
customer_reviews.text: These reusable pee pads are the best ones I've come across. I've bought others that are smaller and/or don't contain the urine smell. But these are a good size and really contain the smell which is fantastic. And to wash them I throw them in the washer by themselves with some detergent, hot water and some Odoban. I have 3 dogs, one of which is a miniature dachsund who was raised in a puppy mill and we just can't get her to stay on the grass long enough to do her business. These were a shot in the dark and they have really been a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: AudreyW

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cats, Too!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these whelping pads for the traditional purpose. I have a very old cat who's in palliative care. She tends to have accidents (pooping, peeing, and vomiting). I use these pads in my home office where she often stays. I also use them wherever she likes to sleep. These pads have made my life a lot easier, as they wash up very well. They have a liquid-proof layer. So, they protect all my furniture and they are padded. So, my old kitty likes to sleep on them.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 14 year old chihuahua. Been using the disposable for years. These are much more absorbent and more water proof. I put them through the rinse cycle first then through the regular wash cycle. Then I dried them on the low heat setting. They came thru great. The label said not to use fabric softener. They are a little stiff so putting them through the washer and dryer first will soften them up a little. He uses them with no issues and I think they are easier to deal with than the disposables. The liquid just seems to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: CatMommy58

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent. Doesn’t hold up to chewing.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d of taken a picture of these to show everyone how amazing they are. I had these pads for almost 8 months. I left one in his kennel at all times while kennel training. Never leaked or had an issue. The past few weeks the poor pads became the victim of teething. I will say that they made less of a cleanup than his bed, or the paper potty pads that you get from pet stores. Cleaning this one up was a matter of 1 min. It was great! I’m considering ordering a couple more because I liked them so much, just waiting until after the teething stage. 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: God21frey

customer_reviews.title: So great for incontinence dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so mad I didn't turn to these sooner. They are large, have high absorbency, and clean up very well. My very large incontinent baby will cry unless she is in bed with me. I have had to wash sheets and bedding multiple times a week due to accidents leaking off of normal puppy pads. After purchasing these, I just toss them into the wash after an accident. It has saved me hours of trouble. They are very large, and have a durable plastic backing. If you have started making your search, please just give in and buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Blumhorst

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable washable puppy pads!
customer_reviews.text: I use this reusable puppy pads for a special cat that does not use the litter box; it's an alternative option. It's a great puppy pad to use as a reinforcement to assist in protecting your floors along with using puppy litter/disposable pads that is used on top of the Simple Solution Large Washable Puppy Pad. If you have a cat for this case or a puppy then, I would definitely recommend purchasing this item. You can wash these washable puppy pads in the washer and dry it in dryer ; it will be fine to use again. The reusable washable puppy pads lasts a long time on the wear.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small elderly dog who has become less diligent about letting me know she needs to go out. She will use a puppy pad so, I got these to put under the puppy pads because sometimes she goes right at the edge of the pad and it runs off. I expected these to be waterproof to keep the spillage off the floor underneath. They are absorbent, but they are not waterproof. They are easy to clean, and thankfully my laminate flooring is easy to clean. Don't use them on carpet though.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Silverhawk

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 of these five years ago when I got dog from a shelter.The owners had to give her up. She was paper trained.' I converted from newspapers to Simple Solution pads. I wash them every week and they are still like new. The are imprgnated with a deoderizer and it is still there and works. I think this is beyond remarkable!
customer_reviews.author: Weegi

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love These Pads
customer_reviews.text: I have two puppies that use these as their primary potty area, and I love, love love these. Very absorbent, no odor. I wash them about every three days in hot water with bleach. I have some from my last dog, so they have lasted several years and are still going strong. So much better than disposables.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Baskin

customer_reviews.title: These are great for absorbing pet messes
customer_reviews.text: These are great for absorbing pet messes. I am using mine as a crate liner while I am training my puppy. One thing though--read the packaging! You should not wash these with fabric softener, as it can make them less water resistant. I wish I had read that before I washed mine several times. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Sblaki

customer_reviews.title: Good pad-questionable absorbency
customer_reviews.text: I use the mat for my rabbit when she is out of her hutch. She peed on it several times and sometimes the pad is wet on the other side-however my rabbit tends to pee on the edges, so it is possible that it leaks on the edge, hence I am still giving it 4 starts for absorbency. Other than that the pad is super easy to clean. Just trow it in the washer and dryer and it's like new!
customer_reviews.author: Ania Broz-St

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally and aesthetically better replacement to disposable puppy pads
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in order to reduce the amount of waste and plastic I used for my cat that was spraying out side his litter box, and it's working great. And it looks much better than disposable puppy pads. So far cleaning has been simple, and I treat pee spots with vinegar before washing for extra deodorization, and either line dry or use the dryer at medium heat. I've only had them for a few weeks, so I don't know how many washings they will last through, but other reviewers have said they last a while.
customer_reviews.author: QuanYin4

customer_reviews.title: Not leak through proof
customer_reviews.text: Pup has been using it so that is bonus however the bottom isn't waterproof so you have to replace it after even ONE pee or it leaks thru to the floor or carpet. I have been using disposables underneath but the goal was not to have to. Cute and large sized however. If they could only waterproof one side.
customer_reviews.author: Smartypants_Monica

customer_reviews.title: You Have to Try These
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! My 2nd set! Have a 12 lb. dog who is fully pad trained. She has used the faux grass pads and paper pads for the past 4 yrs. Liked the idea of being able to wash in hot water and being able to add some bleach to disinfect. They wash amazingly well. Never an odor or wet tracking. Poops come up easily. If there is a small spot I use a moist wipe to just clean it off. My doggie went right to them and has never missed yet. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Very Absorbent  - Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! They work so well. They are affordable, don't leak. I've now had them for weeks. I use them for about 4 days before washing, with a 1.5 kg puppy. There is a bit of an odd smell when the urine combines with the layers inside that are used to soak, but it's tolerable. I am only giving 4 stars because the stitching was done poorly. I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good for portability
customer_reviews.text: Once I got over the fact that these “large” pads are actually really, really small for large breed dogs, I really have grown to appreciate them! We have a golden retriever puppy, and I was hoping to alternate these in her exercise pen. Unfortunately, they didn’t cover half the space. I have a much larger pad that I use for that purpose now. However, these are perfect for a portable/washable, non-slip, resting pad for dog training classes, and vet visits. Their size makes it easy to fold and stow them away.
customer_reviews.author: Feeze

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, durable, probably better for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Work well enough, not absorbent enough for a large dog pee accident in my opinion. Very easy to clean as they go in the washing machine and they seem to be durable. Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: So this did not absorb anything and absolutely did not clean. Every time my dog went to pee I had to clean under the pad and scrub the pads and wash them in the washer multiple times. Finally after about a week I threw them out and went to throw away pads. All this because the place we live requested we try not to use the potty area if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: These work great in the guinea pig cage!
customer_reviews.text: We are using these to line the bottom of our guinea pig cage. This is the first time we have tried it after reading up on it online. Success! Works great and we will save a ton of money on pine shavings. We bought 2 sets of these so we can change out the pads each week. My husband hand-washes the pads because he wants them to last longer, but package says you can machine wash if you want to. Works great with the Natures Miracle Laundry Boost Stain and Odor Additive fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: It's handy in an untended way
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try these out as an alternative to disposable puppy pads. It's a great idea, but there is no way to tell if it's been peed on.... or if the pee came out in the wash. Am I supposed to do a smell test? No thanks! But one thing it's great for is catching the droplets of moisture around the water bowl or for use as a crate liner.
customer_reviews.author: indoorvoice

customer_reviews.title: I do not post reviews often, but when I do it is because the product works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a two pack back in January. The worked wonderfully as advertised. So, I purchased another set in February. Follow the instructions on how to clean it. I have washed the ones I have several time each, and no problems. They still work, and do not leak! After washing just let them air dry. It doesn’t take long for one to dry. I bought this product because we were worried that our wood flooring in one spot was going to be damaged. We have an old Chihuahua with medical problems. We have tried other products that did not work, or did not last very long. Buy this brand - it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: G. Hogsten

customer_reviews.title: Washable, absorbent, does not leak, great for older dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Easily washable and have held up with numerous wash cycles with bleach, they lay flat, absorb urine without leaking, and provide my senior pet with a place to do his business when he cannot wait for us to let him out or come home. These allowed us to have more time with him without ruining wood floors. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: charliebear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pads for pups
customer_reviews.text: My little girl is 14 years old and she spends a lot of time bundled up in her bed. Sometimes in the middle of the night she will drink water then pee. I’ve tried rubber mats and other means but found these washable pads and they work beyond what I expected. Plan to purchase a couple more so I can trade them out when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: These are so great! My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: These are so great! My dog loves it. So easy to throw in the wash. I have several so I am not using the same two all the time. They last longer that way. Another thing I like is you can barely see the wetness once the urine has soaked in. I change them in the morning and evening so I don't have the urine smell in the room. Will buy these again when the ones I have wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of pets. 5 cats and 2 dogs to be exact. I love this product and I own 4 of them. It's really simple to clean, just throw in the wash and your done. It served as a great piece of mind when traveling with my cats in a 4 hour plane ride. Now I mostly use it as a litter box matt because one of my older cats likes to sometime pee in front of the box instead of inside. I have put the Matt's throu the hot water sanitizing cycle in my washer and they are all still good as new ( and I only had to that because cat pee smell is a menace)
customer_reviews.author: Nydsia M. Gonzalez Guasch

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These have been great for my 26lb Frenchie rescue who had been several pregnancies and has bladder issues. I’ve been using they routinely for over 2 years. They are both washer and drier safe. I usually let them air dry just in hope that it prolongs their lifespan, but I have used the drier a few times when in a pinch. I started with 2 and quickly followed that order with another 2. 4 have been plenty to cycle through but could see 6 being useful for bigger dogs or people who don’t do want to run the washer but once a week. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Errol Lepianka

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective and environmentally sound
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I rinse them in water to get most of the pee out then wash them in the washer and dryer with a regular load. One pad lasts a week for my small, old dog. There is no smell compared to the disposable ones I used to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tsarat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these pads for nearly a year now and they are holding up great. I toss them in the washer with vinegar and hot water once or twice a month and they don't show any signs of wear yet. It saves me money from buying disposable pads and I am not dumping more plastic in the landfills.
customer_reviews.author: Ceesattler

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give this 10 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy way I can keep my floors clean and dry with this product. The crazy weather we have experienced in my neck of Texas meant piddle pad usage went sky high. I thought I would have to retrain my "Crew" - 6 mini doxies - but as soon as I put the product down they started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Louan K. Wigton

customer_reviews.title: Durable, absorbent training pad!
customer_reviews.text: These pads were fantastic for potty training our puppy. We placed the pad in front of our patio door, and he quickly learned to sit by that door when he needed out. I really like the fact that you can use chlorine bleach when washing these. They have held up very well, and even though our pup is potty trained, we still place one of these as the back door to wipe wet paws on when coming inside.
customer_reviews.author: CoolBreeze

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for my Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coverage for my Yorkshire Terrier's enclosure. I have washed and dried the pads several times and they are still in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the wee pee’er in your life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a miniature dachshund. She has a hard time walking and cannot always make it to or on her pee pad, so we wash A lot of her blankets and mop her area. These are great, washerable, and you get two of them. I just wish they were a little bit larger so they’d cover her whole squared sleep/play-pen.
customer_reviews.author: S E P

customer_reviews.title: They don't drink up your house like disposable ones
customer_reviews.text: These are a life changer. Don't have to waste money on disposable anymore! My dogs don't chew them up like they did the disposable ones! The best part is THEY DONT STINK UP MY HOUSE! I clean them with detergent and vinegar. My dogs were also peeing off the disposable ones but they actually like to pee on these. Fantastic product and very durable and leak proof
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: Before buying these I had what they call a "poddy patch". It was a plastic tray with artificial grass. It was HORRIBLE. It did not matter how much I soaked it in bleach for clean up it ALWAYS had an odor. I bought these and they are perfect. Just pick one up, put it in the washer and use the other one in its place. Absolutely no odor EVER. I gate my puppies in the bathroom when not at home and this is what they use. They clean easily, they DO NOT leak, no mess. I will buy more when needed but these will last forever. Great stitching, well made.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: They are not the same
customer_reviews.text: They leak! Horribly! And I even have a disposable pad on top. I'm not sure what changed in the manufacturing but don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: NolaInAtl

customer_reviews.title: better than alternatives
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 2 sets (4 pads). So much more attractive than what I was using previously, and they definitely work. I have been cleaning them outside with a powerful setting on my hose, since the weather has been warm. I just wonder how they will hold up with repeated washings in the machine when the weather gets cold.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: These work with minor drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: With senior dogs, we have accidents. These pads soak up all liquids although I do find they are difficult to wash/dry because they are so absorbent. They are good quality but I feel the need to wash them more than once due to odor. I end up using a combo of these as well as disposable mats. Like most mats they are slippery underneath so I have to put tub mats underneath so my dogs don't fall. Overall, they work. If you don't want disposable pads, these are very good alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Underthesamebluesky

customer_reviews.title: So far, So Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11 year old, diabetic Schnoodle who was going thru multiple regular pads per day and they all leaked...even the ones that said they didn’t leak. I was mopping the floor every morning when I woke up, an every evening when I got home from work. I was beginning to get depressed. Then I decided to try these washable pads and so far so good. They dont leak, the dont slide and they dont stink. I can barely tell if he’s even used it without touching it. I’ve washed them only twice but i’m buying another pack so that I can rotate. These pads are saving my floor, my patience and my sanity. :o)
customer_reviews.author: Royaltee

customer_reviews.title: Not so fragrant welping pads.
customer_reviews.text: The idea that I have in mind was saving the environment by using reusable pads ....well the smells that these pads hold are more than I could bear. My 4lb Yorkie makes maybe 2-4 tbs of urine at a time. The stench from that little piddle was horrible. I soaked this pad for two days in a neutralizing solution to finally get the stench out. Other reviewers said just wash...I’m not sure what they washed it in, but when I soaked it the color of the water in the tub explained the smell. Unfortunately I’ll have to save the planet another way.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene Antoine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are thin and do not absorb the liquid well. It still leaves the puppy wet. I will not purchase again. The Pet Parent Brand pads sold on Amazon are twice as good and only a couple dollars more. Buy those.
customer_reviews.author: Artless

customer_reviews.title: does leak thru, but with an underpad underneath it works fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 pack and the first time my pup urinated we checked under it and it totally leaked thru! So we bought white crib protector pads and put one underneath these pads and it works. My puppy has really started getting the hang of it and consistently goes on her pads!! Im going to get 2 more packs so we have 6 total and can have a fresh one daily, giving 4 stars because its not 100 percent leak proof/ water proof By the way my pup is a tiny chihuahua weighing only 3 lbs 6 oz and her little tiny puddle of pee leaked thru, if you have a medium to large dog i would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Rose

customer_reviews.title: They do not hold up well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these several months ago as an option to not having to go purchase disposable one. I find that now, the pee goes straight through to the floor. I have followed the washing instructions to the letter yet when I pick them up to replace them, the floor is wet. I have purchased a couple of different brands on here that do better.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Bought them for my senior dog who can’t hold it like she used to. We keep them on the floor where she usually goes and they work wonderfully. I’m about to buy a third pack just to have extras to swap in between washings. If you need pads for everyday use these are much better than disposable pads—larger too.
customer_reviews.author: Trish A.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Works
customer_reviews.text: Our two dogs are a year and two years old. They will not pee on it so I have to slide it under. Easy to do for the male, more difficult for the female. To be successful, I believe you have to train them to use it when they are puppies. I leave it outside and wash it periodically. They get good exercise. I only use it just before we go to bed as it saves me a long walk. For me it needs to be a bit stiffer so I can slide it under better. But it saves the grass, the little that we have.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Stuart

customer_reviews.title: If your dog has bad aim, you need these
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these mats for a couple months. I use them under paper pads with a four year old dog. They serve the purpose of catching over flows and bad aims. They wash up easily and so far no stains. I like the brown color, actually, as I feel it would disguise stains if or when they appear. I do not add bleach to the wash water, just my personal preference. Since I started using these there has never been a leak onto the floor so I am very pleased about that. There is no smell, either, after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Marta SolitaireTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pads can’t be beat for training as well as use during inclement weather or on porches, decks, patios. Buy more than one so you have one for use while you throw the other in the washer. Do Not place in dryer in order to retain smell that draws the pup/dog to the mat. Line dry
customer_reviews.author: mimimarian

customer_reviews.title: Fool proof potty area
customer_reviews.text: Just received these pads and they fit perfectly in a plastic pan I got that is designed to go under a washing machine. It cannot move about, and the little lip on the pan encourages the pupster to do her business "inside the lines." I will update about the quality of the pads at a later time after I have had the opportunity to wash and dry for several cycles.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: We have saved so much money!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They are absorbent, block odor, and have saved us a bunch of money so far on disposable puppy pads. I will be ordering more! Our puppies are 6lbs and 11lbs. A large one works for both of them. They each have their preferred sides. We supplement with potty outside, but when it’s too cold or snowy, they prefer to use the puppy pad. On a heavy use day, we wash it after 2 days. It can sometimes last up to five days when going outside is an option . Either way, no odor! No issues when washing, they come out good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: My older dog is having some health issues and needs ...
customer_reviews.text: My older dog is having some health issues and needs pads during the subzero winter days. We’ve used and washed these quite a few times and they are holding up. I place a paper pad on top to catch the really smelly stuff, and use the washable pad to protect the floor.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerAmazonFeedback

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pad for training
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if my lab loves them but I do. Training has been easier with these pads. Great quality and super absorbent. I have a 5 months old chocolate lab and they hold for 3 - 4 days. Clean up is a breeze, just throw them in the washing machine with some bleach and detergent and they are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Paco

customer_reviews.title: This saves my furbaby from timeout.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have purchase three times . I use them for my puppy. When he has an accident and can't make it outside in time, this is the best alternative. They wash well just follow the washing directions and they will last a long time.I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs fast! Neutral pattern.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very absorbent. Not as noticeable as other types. Can last multiple days for small dog. Reusable/washable. Cons: Last about 6 months. Which is still a pretty good savings over disposable wee wee pads. But after about 6 mos of weekly or 2x weekly washings the pee smell is now permanent. I have tried baking soda and oxy to clean. I would and am repurchasing. It's a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya B

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE These Washable Wee Wee Pads!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these washable wee wee pads for my two small dogs. I live in a two story house, and I keep some on both floors, just in case. No more accidents to clean up! They wash and reuse beautifully! SO easy and convenient. Before I got these, I was buying SO many disposable pads! Now, I only have to buy the disposable ones occasionally for travel, etc., because we just keep reusing these over and over. I have not experienced any leak-through with these pads at all. HIGHLY RECOMMEND for any pet owner with dogs inside!
customer_reviews.author: TexasG

customer_reviews.title: Great for guinea pig cage
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than EZ whelp pads but seem to hold urine as well, if not better. Use it for my guinea pig cage in place of fleece. Hay does not stick to it and can be easily brushed off. Have had it for a few months now, and seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: DepecheModeNewOrderU2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 very elderly dogs and these pads were fabulous! They washed and dried up beautifully and helped to save my carpets. I’d definitely get them again when these wear out whenever that might be. I’ve used them for at least a year and washed And dried them regularly. They still work great!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Better than disposable!
customer_reviews.text: With two tiny under 5lb puppies I was going through quite a few disposable wee pads a week and no matter how much I washed the "grass" mats held in the urine smell so I started to look for other options. I came acrosss these and figured, why not? I am so glad that I did! These work great and a bonus is, the puppies don't look at these like a play toy like they do with the disposable ones. They seem to wick away the moisture and there is very little to no smell. They also wash up great and even after running through the dryer (on low) they lay flat afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Reecy KingTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I use these to protect my tile. I still put a regular pee pee pad on top of it. They catch all the drips when my puppy misses her pad. I wash them on HOT with OXI and bleach and let them air dry.... I have had 2 sets of these for 18 months and they are still in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered more of these. I hated seeing puppy pads around the house but I really need them in my carpeted bedroom. These pads are a great size and more attractive. They are very absorbent and do the job! Best of all, they wash and dry like a dream. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rice

customer_reviews.title: They work so good!! I have NEVER had a leak thr!!
customer_reviews.text: June 2016: I would give 10 Stars if I could!!! They work so good!! I have NEVER had a leak thru! NO ODOR after washing~ USE FABRIC SOFTENER!! I will be buying more and more!! Nov 2016: UPDATE: I have now used these same pads 7 to 8 Months, not one has fallen apart and I wash them "daily"! They have never had a urine odor after washing... I also put "pure peroxide" (1/8 cup) in the bleach dispenser, with Tide and fabric softener, they come out sooooo nice!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!
customer_reviews.author: Sister

customer_reviews.title: They’re not holding up
customer_reviews.text: This product is not stitched all the way through and after using it twice it shredded picture sent along I would not recommend this item to nobody and I would be greatly appreciated to get them replaced the ones I do have I’m going to have to repair DO NOT BUY JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Mlb

customer_reviews.title: No more Disposables!
customer_reviews.text: These have been extremely effective with my pup. I throw them in the washer and they come out looking brand-new. I have hated using the disposables, which are not as absorbent as this kind, and making more plastic waste.
customer_reviews.author: Arlow P. Arlow

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a potty training puppy, these are amazing. We'd put one by our front door with a towel over the top to save the hardwood floors in case of accidents. Machine washable, easy to fold and store. A 2 pack was enough for us to get through the potty training phase. Now we keep one under the water dish!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is too perfect that I had to buy another pack! I live in an apartment, neighbor just moved in with a dog. Mine doesn't get along with it and started peeing out of instinct of being territorial whenever they take their dog out during the day. I bought this to soak up the pee whenever my dog pee in her crate. Odor is very minimal to none. It soaks up nicely and is washable! Saves you $ and environmental friendly
customer_reviews.author: AnythingCathleen

customer_reviews.title: They always smell bad. I ended up throwing them away
customer_reviews.text: After using for a couple months, I am editing my review. I have noticed that the pads never smell clean.. no matter how much detergent or bleach I use, no matter what wash cycle, no matter how many rinse cycles... They always smell bad. I ended up throwing them away. They are absorbent for sure, they don't leak or anything so they do the job. Just don't be surprised if you can't get rid of the urine smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for house-training our puppy and keeping his kennel mess free while we were making a quick 45 minute run to the grocery store. It saved us so much money in the fact that we could wash it instead of throwing it away and buying pack after pack of disposables. (Not to mention, we didn't have to take out even more garbage due to this.) The only reason we stopped using it is because the puppy finally chewed them up, despite constant training. He just really loved how they felt in his mouth. No fault of the product. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mystik

customer_reviews.title: Removing the smell and avoiding leakage is difficult
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of these pee pads in hopes of never having to use plastic pee pads again, but found that these were just not manageable. The pee pads retained some unpleasant smell after being washed in a new industrial washer and, over time, allowed leakage to occur through the sides. I am not sure if I received defective ones, but I won't be purchasing more. It was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: The Supers

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my senior dog. No Odor! Only drawback for me is the backing is rigid which my dog doesn’t like, but he finally settled down on it ( using on our bed). Does the job.! Not as big as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even use these. Opened it up and it was really small. Smaller than what i expected and XL to be! Trying to return although I’m not sure how that’s going to work now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not just for puppies - I buy these over and over again
customer_reviews.text: Pet Parents these are great. Large - washable - and they do what you need them to do. In all honesty I even use them for elderly family members.
customer_reviews.author: Ann C.

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered more
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to help keep my sanity after my beloved dog recently developed incontinence issues. They are great - soft, absorbent top fabric without any leaks. They're also machine washable AND dry-able. I purchased a second pair so I could line dry (which will hopefully help them last longer). Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fair price
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying 4 of these so I can have 2 down at the time, my little dogs use them very well. I spent a lot on those little potty pads disposable and they didn’t last all day. I bought the first two and saw how good they are a few moths later ordered the second order
customer_reviews.author: Reagans Granny

customer_reviews.title: Floor Savers
customer_reviews.text: We have been using disposable pads for our senior chihuahua. They leak and there's always a mess to clean. These pads have saved me so much time. Very absorbent. No smell (surprisingly). Just toss in the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissiO

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these, because my dog does not use the bathroom outside. But they are really good , the only thing you can not tell if she has potty on them until after a few times, then they will smell. I literally had them in place for like four days before I smelled anything ( mind you my dog is 1 year old and 9 lbs). I wash them every 2 days just because regardless if they are used or not. throw them in the dryer for about 20 min. and back on the floor they go.
customer_reviews.author: SLTSTRM

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste, get these cute pads!
customer_reviews.text: These wee wee pads are awesome! I have one ferret who just refuses to be litter trained and so I put this in their cage so that he can go without making a huge mess and me wasting disposable pads. They clean quite easily, especially when using Nature's Miracle Urine Destroyer to get everything out, and look very nice. The design makes them a cute addition and much more difficult for my fuzzbutts to try and move around. Definitely would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: After only 2 months, the backing LEAKS through to my floors.
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this product a great review. However, after having them for only 2 months, and washing them twice weekly, they LEAK THROUGH the back of the pads to my nice wood floors! Ugh. I truly do wish they were, “leakproof with a waterproof backing” as their ad says.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Simple solution large washable pads
customer_reviews.text: My cat lives under our sofa ,(all the cats pick her on) so she is afraid to go to the litter without being attack so she goes under our sofa so I used the large pee pads doubled over and make it kind of a folded up approach and it worked, she peed right into it. I used the smaller ones and she moved them and peed on the throw away pads. Larger ones work better.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Comello

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: These pads are a lifesaver. In December I got two mini dachshund puppies. Wth the winter deep freeze we had in the mid-west, It was not recommended that 3 pound puppies go outside in below 0 temps. I bought these pads and was able to train the pups in just a couple of days. They wash easily in the washer with a little bleach and I hang them up to dry with skirt hangers (with the pinchey things). They dry quickly and do not smell. Great invention. When it warms up I will put one out on the grass so they learn to go outside.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Overmyer

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture protection.
customer_reviews.text: These puppies pads work great and clean well. Well designed with rubber on the back. Our dog likes the pads better than a blanket.Great
customer_reviews.author: Maggiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof
customer_reviews.text: These pads absorb a tremendous amount of urine. Not a solution for odor but does control it for a few days. They do not leak thru and hold the liquid well when picked up on edge.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in spite of the reviews, and kept a plastic garbage bag under it just in case, but it never leaked through. My dog is tiny, so maybe not the best measure of its effectiveness
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Durability and odor
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these another try and comparing with 2 other brands in regard to length of time before there is an odor. I change pads twice a day for a mature chihuahua. I will update my review after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a great product, it does what it's supposed to do well, it still has a few flaws. My dog peed on it in her crate, because we use it for accidents, and the pee got through the bottom layer. My dog was also easily able to rip all of it to shreds. I give it 3 stars because it does what it says, it's not perfect but it definitely does what it should.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Work great I got them because I figured what’s the harm for the same price I would pay for the disposables I get something I can use for a lot longer they are very absorbent and durable cleaning them was easy I even put them in the washing machine and none of the stitching or anything gave. If something changes I will update this
customer_reviews.author: Ginjer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase, I had my doubts but I read the recommendations of other buyers of the product. And the best thing is that I no longer use disposable pad, less garbage! I have a dachshund and it uses the pad a full day. The pad absorbs and dries quickly, does not wet the floor. I wash it in the washing machine with baking soda and hot water. Only sometimes I have to wash twice. It also works to let it soak.
customer_reviews.author: Squeare

customer_reviews.title: Holds strange scent/Environmentally Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a while now and I do enjoy that it helps save money and is environmentally more friendly. My only con is having to wash it every two days because it holds a very rotten soiled smell. The smell was so bad I assumed my dog had a UTI and that wasn’t the case at all just the pads creating a nasty scent after one day of use. Any suggestions on why this could be happening?
customer_reviews.author: Nybye

customer_reviews.title: These people pads are the best put them in the wash I want to rotate ...
customer_reviews.text: These people pads are the best put them in the wash I want to rotate them every six months purchase new ones great when it’s rainy days I have small dogs but it works good for any dog that is well-trained
customer_reviews.author: Pollyanna

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just as stated, easy to clean. Whenever there's an accident I hose it down outside to remove the excess, and soak in the sink to sanitize before throwing in washer. I bought two, so when one has been soiled the other can be used. Get product!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great pads
customer_reviews.text: these pads are good size and good quality. have ordered other pads and the white fabric tends to stain. has not been an issue with these pads. would highly recommend them as we have had them almost 2 months now without the slightest sign of ware
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Durable! After 5 years, I'm back for more!
customer_reviews.text: After 5 years, I'm back to buy more. We have an additional furbaby in our house and wanted to have extra on hand. Durable, absorbs well, easy to wash in wash, hang dry or medium heat in dryer, dogs attracted to pad.
customer_reviews.author: J Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are older and I put these down at night Incase they have an accident. I LOVE these very easy to wash and it doesn’t soak through to my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be great quality but I have not had to wash it yet
customer_reviews.text: Great quality although I haven't had to wash it yet. Some people have asked....Please note, the underside/backing is a slick plastic type material and will slide across the floor. I do wish that it did not have paw prints and the logo printed all across the front, but I did know this before purchasing...just wish it was plain.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

product_meta.title: Simple Solution Large Washable Puppy Pad | Reusable Dog Pee Pad | Absorbent and Odor Controlling | 30x32 Inches, 2 Count
product_meta.description: Size:30" x 32"/2 PackMaybe you need a more robust training pad, or would like to stop throwing away so much. Simple Solution Large Washable Training and Travel Dog Pads are a durable and reusable alternative to disposable pads. The moisture-wicking top sheet means little paws won’t track the mess onto your clean floors. Super absorbent and versatile, you can use them for everything from furniture protection to place mats.
feature_bullets: REUSABLE Simple Solution Large Washable Training and Travel Dog Pads are a super absorbent solution for pet parents who want a reusable alternative to disposable training pads. What may surprise you is just how versatile these tough pads are.
NO MESS These 30 x 32 inch pads have a moisture wicking top sheet that eliminates tracking and controls odor. Your puppy won’t track their mess onto your floors and furniture.
MAXIMUM CAPACITY These house training and travel pads can hold up to 10 times more liquid than our standard disposable economy pads.

VERSATILE Reusable, and with so many uses: Protect furniture and bedding, line kennels and crates, use them as post surgery pads, place them under your messy eaters’ food bowls even your kitties can use them as litter box mats
TWO IS BETTER Each package includes two (2) large washable training and travel pads.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
